mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, password, name, gender, email) values(#{userid}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{email})
mapper.select: select userid, name from member where userid=#{userid} and password=#{password}
mapper.delete: delete from member where userid=#{userid} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update member set password=#{new_password} where userid=#{userid} and password=#{password}
